title: ZOOCCHINI Potty Training Pants Unisex, Organic, Fairy Tale Character, Absorbent, Soft and Comfortable Training Underwear for Girls and Boys 2-4 Years (Pack of 3)
features: CERTIFIED ORGANIC COTTON: Designed in the USA using super soft, organically grown cotton; Extra layer of double-sided terry for super absorbency in case of an accident
EASY-ON, EASY-OFF: Elasticized waist has no buttons, snaps or belts; Easy for toddlers to pull on and off all by themselves
PLAYFUL DESIGNS: 3 whimsical designs included with every order; The fun, bright colors make potty training more fun
VARIETY OF USES: Great for naps, bedtime and travel outside the home, whether to daycare or to see Grandma
FIND THE RIGHT FIT: Ages 2T/3T: Fits approx. 26-33 lbs; Ages 3T/4T: Fits approx. 30-37 lbs
description: Good-bye diapers! Hello, “My First Pair of Underwear.” There comes a point in every toddler’s life when diapers are needed less and underwear is just too risky. This presents the perfect opportunity to give your child their first pair of potty training pants.After a few weeks of successful potty breaks, experts recommend transitioning your child into training pants before committing to regular underwear. ZOOCCHINI 100% Organic Cotton Potty Training Pant Sets are a great stepping stone during this exciting period of passage and growth in your child’s life!Available in a variety of animal characters and in sizes 2T-4T, our unique training pants are made of super soft, organically grown cotton, and have a layer of double sided terry sandwiched between the layers of cotton for extra absorbency where it's needed most.Each set of potty training pants comes with three exclusive ZOOCCHINI designs. These cute animals, with a turn me around feature on the back, help make potty training more fun and less of a chore for your little one. Choose your child’s favorite character and see how our training pants can help increase motivation and reward successful potty training.It’s time to dress your toddler for success the daycare way! Jump-start toilet training with ZOOCCHINI 100% Organic Cotton Potty Training Pant Sets.Already potty-trained and ready for big-boy-big girl underwear? Check out ZOOCCHINI Organic Girls Panty sets & Boys Boxer sets.Care: Machine Wash, Tumble Dry LowTo get maximum usage from all garments, please read and follow all washing and care instructions. Made to be worn and washed without weakening or showing signs of wear.Returns:Due to hygiene reasons ZOOCCHINI does not permit returns or exchanges for underwear and training pants, even if packaging has not been opened.
